char_info.char_desc: The Plant Whose Hair Never Stops Growing

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: This long hair effect is annoying. I need to solve this incident before I make any cuts or trimmings permanent.
All attempts you make will fail. This spell you're under affects more than just the hair on your scalp.
You don't seem to understand how this spell happens to affect all women in Gensokyo.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It doesn't seem to make any sense.
You will never break this spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I must find some way to rid myself of this absurd hairstyle.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't intend to spend a lot of time looking like a girl grabbing the eyes of boys.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I also have no intent on becoming a long-hair model.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I will not be resting until this problem is resolved. Do you know anything about this spell?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I might know a word or two, but you seem to resolve all incidents.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You're the shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine after all.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I know that, but I won't be defeated by this. I will end this spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Say what? This spell is the fertilizer that makes hair feel like grass!

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You want to try damaging my hair? Go ahead!
